trans-unit.source: Represents a query that tests whether the action of a message is one of a specified set of actions.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma consulta que testa se a ação de uma mensagem é um de um conjunto especificado de ações.

trans-unit.source: It is invalid to construct an ActionMessageFilter with no actions.
trans-unit.target: É inválido para construir uma ActionMessageFilter com nenhuma ação.

trans-unit.source: This type is serializable as a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo é serializável como <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of this class with the set of actions for which it tests.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância desta classe com o conjunto de ações para os quais os testes.

trans-unit.source: If the array of `actions` provided to populate the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> contains duplicate actions, the duplicates are removed and only one of them is added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>.
trans-unit.target: Se a matriz de `actions` fornecidos para povoar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>contém ações de duplicados, os duplicados são removidos e apenas uma delas é adicionada ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of `actions` contained in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> is accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Actions%2A> property and cannot be modified after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> object is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>de `actions` contidas no <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>é acedida pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Actions%2A>propriedade e não pode ser modificado depois do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>é criar instâncias do objecto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Actions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> that contains the set of actions for which the filter tests.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Array>que contém o conjunto de ações para o qual o filtro de testes.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: actions is .
trans-unit.target: actionsis .

trans-unit.source: The actions array is empty.
trans-unit.target: O actions matriz está vazia.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only copy of action strings for which this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref> tests.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cópia só de leitura de cadeias de ação para que este <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref> testes.

trans-unit.source: The actions in the read-only collection returned cannot be modified after the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter> object is instantiated.
trans-unit.target: As ações na coleção só de leitura devolvido não podem ser modificadas depois do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>é criar instâncias do objecto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> that contains the action strings for which this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref> tests.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> que contém as cadeias de ação para o qual este <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref> testes.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a message's action matches one of the actions specified in this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Testa se a ação de uma mensagem corresponde a uma das ações especificadas <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A> when a message must be tested against the actions in a single filter and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> is available.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta sobrecarga de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>Quando uma mensagem deve ser testada relativamente as ações num único filtro e a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>está disponível.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>A testar.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> action header matches one of the specified actions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>cabeçalho action corresponde a uma das ações especificadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: message is .
trans-unit.target: messageis .

trans-unit.source: Tests whether a buffered message's action header matches one of the actions specified in this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Testa se o cabeçalho de ação de uma mensagem de memória intermédia corresponde a uma das ações especificadas <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A> method when a message must be tested against the actions in a single filter and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> is available.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta sobrecarga do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>método quando uma mensagem deve ser testada relativamente as ações num único filtro e a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>está disponível.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ActionMessageFilter.Match%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>A testar.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer> action header matches one of the specified actions; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>cabeçalho action corresponde a uma das ações especificadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageBuffer>

trans-unit.source: messageBuffer is .
trans-unit.target: messageBufferis .
